⚠️ Error Codes Reference

E05 high
Temperature sensor issue
Check probe & fan
E18 medium
Restricted airflow
Clean filters
E32 medium
Door switch problem
Adjust latch
E40 high
Heating element fault
Check element continuity
E55 critical
Control board error
Reset or replace board

Common Issues Reference:

Temperature Not Reaching Setpoint
  • • Check heating element continuity
  • • Verify door seal integrity
  • • Clean air filters
  • • Check temperature sensor
Uneven Cooking
  • • Verify fan operation
  • • Check for obstructions
  • • Calibrate temperature sensors
  • • Adjust cooking times
